title: Savais-tu?
content: France is the most visited country in the world.

title: Did you know?
content: There are 61,000 people in the air over the United States at any given moment.

title: هل تعلم؟
content: Saudi Arabia is the only country in the world where there are no rivers.

title: 知ってますか？
content: Raised floors in Japanese houses indicate when to take off your shoes.

title: Lo sapevate?
content: All the money that is tossed into Rome's Trevi Fountain (about 3,000 euros each day) is collected and donated to charitable organizations.
